entries.name: CIS OCP4 OSCO Compliance Scan
entries.description: This workflow automates the CIS compliance scan for OpenShift clusters using OSCO, validates security policies, converts the results into YAML, and ingests them into Concert for compliance tracking.

entries.name: CIS RHEL9 OpenSCAP Compliance Scan
entries.description: This workflow automates the CIS compliance scan for RHEL 9 using OpenSCAP, ensuring security compliance based on CIS benchmarks. The scan results are retrieved and uploaded into Concert for analysis.

entries.name: CISO Agentic AI Assessment
entries.description: This workflow initiates an OpenSCAP scan on a RHEL machine, invokes the Compliance API to run additional control checks through the Assessment Agent, and aggregates all results into a unified OSCAL Assessment Result for ingestion into IBM Concert.
